question: The "North Water Polynya" is located in which ocean?
explanation: North Water Polynya is a polynya located in the Arctic Ocean. A polynya is an area of year-round open water surrounded by sea ice. It is located between Greenland Island Of Denmark and Canada in the northern Baffin Bay. It is also known as North Water. And it forms the world's largest Arctic Polynya. Due to its warm microclimate, it provides an appropriate environment to narwhal, beluga, walrus and bowhead whales to thrive and grow.
